#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int T,N;
int A[100005];
int main()
{
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&N);
		for(int i=0; i<N; i++)scanf("%d",&A[i]);
		sort(A,A+N);
		int flag=0;
		int curr=0;
		int ans=0; int cnt=0;
		for(int i=0; i<N ; i++)
		{
			int tmp=A[i]-curr;
			if(tmp<=0){
				flag=1;
				break;
			}
			curr++;
			ans++;
			cnt++;
			if(cnt==6)
			{
				cnt=0;
				curr++;
			}
		}
		if(flag==1)cout<<"Goodbye Rick"<<"\n"<<ans<<"\n";
		else cout<<"Rick now go and save Carl and Judas"<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
